tool_description: Access to the official Norwegian government company register, ideal for KYB purposes
name: Norway Company Data
title: Norway Company Data

api_list.name: Ownership by company Id
api_list.description: Get the ownership structure of a Noregian company by it's business registration ID
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://norway-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/enhetsregisteret/api/enheter/996761134/roller"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "norway-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://norway-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/enhetsregisteret/api/enheter/{id}/roller"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "norway-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://norway-company-data.p.rapidapi.com/enhetsregisteret/api/enheter/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "norway-company-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
